FPGA Verison Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x4
Size:
0x4
Source:
examp_regs.rdl

Description

Read-only FPGA version register. A new version here indicates that the FPGA HDL has changed in some meaningful way.

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
